text: Mehmet Rüştü Başaran (born 1946/47) is a Turkish billionaire businessman, the head of Habas Industrial and Medical Gases Production Industries, one of Turkey's largest steel producers. In 2018, Mehmet Rustu Basaran ranked #1999 on the Forbes World's Billionaires list, with wealth listed at US $1.1 billion.https://www.forbes.com/billionaires/list/3/#version:static_header:source Habas was founded by his father Hamdi Basaran in 1956. he is the chairman and part owner of Anadolubank. Başaran is divorced, and lives in Istanbul, Turkey. ==References== Category:1940s births Category:Living people Category:Turkish billionaires Category:Turkish businesspeople
title: Mehmet Rüştü Başaran
